description: This file contains unit tests for OAuth login flows for Atlassian integration, including configuration validation, redirect URL correctness, and state handling.

methods.name: test_login_misconfiguration_returns_500_json(client, monkeypatch)
methods.description: Tests that server returns 500 when required environment variables are missing during login initiation.

methods.name: test_login_redirect_contains_expected_params_and_records_state(client)
methods.description: Tests that the OAuth login redirect URL contains the correct parameters and that the 'state' value is correctly recorded in the in-memory store.

methods.name: test_login_with_client_provided_state_is_preserved_and_stored(client)
methods.description: Ensures that a provided 'state' parameter in the login request is preserved in redirect URL and stored.
